item.title: Rob add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "Music has always been a matter of Energy to me, a question of Fuel. Sentimental people call it Inspiration, but what they really mean is Fuel. I have always needed Fuel. I am a serious consumer. On some nights I still believe that a car with the gas needle on empty can run about fifty more miles if you have the right music very loud on the radio." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Rob add a quote by Robert Francis Kennedy
item.description: "There are those who look at things the way they are and ask why... I dream of things that never were, and ask why not?" -- Robert Francis Kennedy

item.title: Rob add a quote by Elvis Costello
item.description: "Good manners and bad breath will get you nowhere." -- Elvis Costello

item.title: Rob add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "I have never let my schooling interfere with my education." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Rob add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all." -- Oscar Wilde
